verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Who shall abide in the day of his coming?
Who shall stand before His throne?
Who will be true and uphold His mighty name?
Only those who have become bone of His bone.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The judgments of the Lord surely come as a burning.
Separating those who are willing to take His rod.
Through chastening the Lord reveals to those who's hearts are yearning.
That mighty is the man who knoweth his God.
